original_title: ＢＵＭＰ: A 6 Hour Visual Bumps mixtape
overview: A 6+ hour online event of visual experimentation and play, celebrating video artists and the art of the broadcast bumper. Visualists were allowed a maximum of 120 seconds to explore each space they decided to create, free to interpret “bumpers” however they wanted. What started out as a passing joke morphed into something very real.

production_companies.name: R y a n C e l s i u s ° S o u n d s
